name: Savana
description: Savana is a narrative point and click game where you play as a young girl from a remote village. The narration of the game tells different story lines from a real life experience of growing up in Mozambique.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT or equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9500 GT Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card
